bibl.title: P. Mich. inv. 3443.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: Document similar to P. Gen. II, 111 (although not exactly a questionnaire), to be produced by a candidate for entering the ephebate (eiskrisis), before, during or after the examination. Alexandria, II AD.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 435-440, 1 pl. coul.

Document similar to P. Gen. II, 111 (although not exactly a questionnaire), to be produced by a candidate for entering the ephebate (eiskrisis), before, during or after the examination. Alexandria, II AD.
